### __Version 1.6__
#### 20-12-2019


_Functionality_

- Added an 'Exact' mode to only visualize connection that are both given in the search bar
- Gene Ontology mode shows the first neighbor metabolites by default (proteins are excluded)
- Metabolite-Metabolite reactions are added from Rhea-DB
- Data table now shows both GO -> Metabolite as well as Metabolite -> GO

_Fixes_

- In Gene Ontology mode, not all connections between nodes were found due to a bug in execution order
- Metabolite locations now show properly which metabolites are located in both Extracellular as Intracellular

_Other_
